text: Is there a way to fetch call logs or call history from HubSpot's CRM using their API? If so, could you provide some documentation or guidance on how to achieve this?
You can do this by changing your brand kit ("My brand kit") under Settings > Account Defaults  > Branding subtab
Great, thank you! I am wondering how to change the logo for one specific page, and have a different logo on the rest of the pages through out the site.

hey guys! I’m able to get access and refresh tokens successfully after a user installs my app, but I am doing that in my backend and need to store those in my DB to associate them with the correct user and then store them in localstorage in the user’s browser. after looking through the api docs i didn’t see what endpoint i can hit with an access token to get the userId that that access token is associated with. do you guys know where i should go for this? or maybe there’s a better solution than the one i’m thinking of?
